page.title: 07PEOPLE
page.content: {PEOPLE} 1) In the Post Office an old couple told us that they had lived in Smalley for 60 years. We found many people had lived in the village for most of their lives. 2)there is a lollipop lady. She said there are very few vandals in Smalley. The lady said that they could do with a community centre in Smalley. 3)An old lady told us that she had lived in Smalley for 65 years.That old lady believed that there are no vandals at all in Smalley as most people knew everyone else. There was a good Community spirit. 4)We also asked an old man who had been living in Smalley 37 years. He said that Smalley could do with a Community Centre.The man said that there plenty of public services.
